entries: Several members of your family have studied at the Magaambya, although not all of them have graduated as lore-speakers (or even advanced past initiates to become attendants). Your family has decided that you're an excellent candidate to join their ranks. Although lore-speakers of the Magaambya know they are supported by the strength of thousands of graduates who have come before them, you can take the smaller, more personal comfort in the support of your family.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Intelligence or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in your choice of the {@skill Diplomacy} or {@skill Society} skill. You gain a skill feat: {@feat Hobnobber} if you chose {@skill Diplomacy} or {@feat Eye for Numbers|APG} if you chose {@skill Society}. You're also trained in {@skill Lore||Magaambya Lore}.
Your recommended primary branch is the Uzunjati.
